title: Selected Works
explanation: Here you'll find a selection of projects that represent my journey as a web developer with more than three years of experience. This portfolio includes both freelance work and collaborations with companies, all centered around modern front-end and CMS development. My focus areas include React, JavaScript, Sass, WordPress (including custom theme development with PHP), and headless CMS architecture. Each project reflects my commitment to building responsive, user-friendly, and technically solid digital experiences.

projects.name: Call Me Guide
projects.alt: Screenshot of Mahdi Roozbahani's portfolio website
projects.shortDescription: Call Me Guide: A platform offering real-time travel guidance with a user-friendly interface and secure payment integration.
projects.overview: This is a platform offering real-time travel guidance with a user-friendly interface and secure payment integration.

Client: Call Me Guide Tourism Service Inc

Technologies: JavaScript Frameworks: React (used for building dynamic user interfaces), Emotion (CSS-in-JS styling for modular and scalable components)
Web Frameworks: Laravel (used for backend functionality, routing, and RESTful APIs)
Programming Languages: PHP (applied in WordPress theme development and backend logic), JavaScript (core language for frontend interactivity and logic)
Security: Google reCAPTCHA (implemented for spam protection in forms)
Features: Secure payments via Stripe: Providing seamless and secure payment processing for users.
Interactive maps using the Google Maps API: Enabling users to explore travel destinations in real-time.
Real-time travel guidance and support: Offering travelers immediate and accurate travel assistance.
Contributions: Founder and main architect of the platform
Led the overall project management and development
Coordinated collaboration between frontend, backend, and design teams
Oversaw the entire project lifecycle to ensure business and technical alignment
Enhanced user experience through real-time updates and intuitive navigation
Worked on frontend design and interactivity using React

projects.name: Redtattoo
projects.alt: Screenshot of Mahdi Roozbahani's portfolio website
projects.shortDescription: A modern and responsive portfolio website built with React to showcase projects and skills.

detailedDescription.overview: This portfolio website was built using React to showcase my projects, skills, and experience in front-end development. It serves as an interactive platform for potential clients and employers to learn more about my work.

Technologies: React: Used for dynamic component management and to create an interactive user experience.
SASS: Applied for clean, maintainable, and responsive styling.
SiteGround: The website is hosted on SiteGround, ensuring reliable performance and uptime.
Vite: Deployed with Vite for fast build times and efficient development.
Features: Project Showcase: Includes an interactive slider to showcase projects with smooth navigation.
Responsive Design: Ensures compatibility across all devices, from desktops to smartphones.
Animations: Smooth text and image animations powered by CSS and Framer Motion for enhanced user experience.
JSON-based Content: All content is dynamically sourced from JSON files, allowing easy updates without modifying the code.
Contributions: Designed and developed the entire site structure and layout.
Created custom React components for dynamic and reusable UI elements.
Styled all UI elements using SASS, ensuring design consistency and responsiveness.
Implemented a JSON-based content management system for easier future updates.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and optimized performance for faster load times.
